response.subject: 1 of your torrents has been deleted for inactivity

messages.bbBody:
One of your uploads has been deleted for being unseeded.  Since it didn't break any rules (we hope), please feel free to re-upload it.

The following torrent was deleted:
Ra - To Sirius [MP3 / 320]
